content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals sin open parentheses 2 x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the domain of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative pi over 4 less or equal than x less or equal than pi over 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following defines <math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="1 half arcsin x"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>arcsin</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 1 half less or equal than x less or equal than 1 half"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​​<math alttext="arcsin open parentheses 1 half x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>arcsin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 1 half less or equal than x less or equal than 1 half"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="1 half arcsin x"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>arcsin</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 1 less or equal than x less or equal than 1"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="arcsin open parentheses 1 half x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>arcsin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 1 less or equal than x less or equal than 1"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="1 half arcsin x"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>arcsin</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 1 less or equal than x less or equal than 1"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
